BBEX3.A.MYR.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Malaysia  / EUR 1 = MYR ... (middle)
Source: Since January 2004 The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation (HSBC Bank), Kuala Lumpur 1999 - December 2003 The Hongkong Bank Malaysia Berhad, Kuala Lumpur
Methodology: Until 2011, calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end buying and selling rates, from 2012 on the basis of month-end rates.
